member.name: T:ConstantContactUtility.Utility
member.summary: Provides utility methods to create a new Contact, update an existing one, etc.

member.name: F:ConstantContactUtility.Utility.WebExceptionCode404Message
member.summary: Constant Contact server error message for error code 404

member.name: F:ConstantContactUtility.Utility.WebExceptionCode403Message
member.summary: Constant Contact server error message for error code 403

member.name: M:ConstantContactUtility.Utility.IsValidUserAuthentication(ConstantContactUtility.AuthenticationData)
member.summary: Verify user authentication
member.param: Authentication data (username, password and API Key)
member.exception: Thrown if communication error with Constant server occur or other related with the response from server or if ApiKey, Username or Password are null or empty

member.name: M:ConstantContactUtility.Utility.GetContactCollection(ConstantContactUtility.AuthenticationData,System.String@)
member.summary: Retrieves the first chunk collection of Contacts that the server provides
member.param: Authentication data (username, password and API Key)
member.remarks: Constant Contact server provides paged collections
member.param: Link to the next chunk of data
member.exception: Thrown if communication error with Constant server occur or other related with the response from server or if ApiKey, Username or Password are null or empty

member.name: M:ConstantContactUtility.Utility.GetContactCollection(ConstantContactUtility.AuthenticationData,System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Retrieves the collection of Contacts returned by server at the current chunk Id
member.param: Authentication data (username, password and API Key)
member.remarks: Constant Contact server provides paged collections
member.param: Link to the current chunk data
Link to the next chunk of data
member.exception: Thrown if communication error with Constant server occur or other related with the response from server or if ApiKey, Username or Password are null or empty

member.name: M:ConstantContactUtility.Utility.SearchContactByEmail(ConstantContactUtility.AuthenticationData,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.String@)
member.summary: Retrieves the first chunk collection of Contacts that match specified Email Addresses
member.remarks: Constant Contact server provides paged collections
member.param: Authentication data (username, password and API Key)
Link to the next chunk of data
member.exception: Thrown if communication error with Constant server occur or other related with the response from server or if ApiKey, Username or Password are null or empty

member.name: M:ConstantContactUtility.Utility.SearchContactByEmail(ConstantContactUtility.AuthenticationData,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Retrieves the collection of Contacts that match specified Email Addresses, returned by the server at current chunk Id. Entire collection of Contacts will be returned if no Email Address is specified
member.remarks: Constant Contact server provides paged collections
member.param: Authentication data (username, password and API Key)
Link to the current chunk data
Link to the next chunk of data
member.exception: Thrown if communication error with Constant server occur or other related with the response from server or if ApiKey, Username or Password are null or empty

member.name: M:ConstantContactUtility.Utility.GetContactDetailsById(ConstantContactUtility.AuthenticationData,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve an individual Contact by its Id
member.param: Authentication data (username, password and API Key)
member.exception: Thrown if communication error with Constant server occur or other related with the response from server or if no Contact with specified Id exists or if ApiKey, Username or Password are null or empty

member.name: M:ConstantContactUtility.Utility.CreateNewContact(ConstantContactUtility.AuthenticationData,ConstantContactBO.Contact)
member.summary: Create a New Contact
member.param: Authentication data (username, password and API Key)
member.remarks: The POST data presents only values for EmailAddress, FirstName, LastName, OptInSource and ContactLists elements
member.exception: Thrown if specified Contact is null
Thrown if E-mail Address of specified Contact is null or empty

Thrown if communication error with Constant server occur or other related with the response from server or if specified Contact does not belongs to any list or if ApiKey, Username or Password are null or empty

member.name: M:ConstantContactUtility.Utility.PostInformation(ConstantContactUtility.AuthenticationData,System.Uri,System.String)
member.summary: POST the data at the specified Uri address and returns the response Stream
member.param: Authentication data (username, password and API Key)
Data to be send at specified Uri address

member.name: M:ConstantContactUtility.Utility.UpdateContactFullForm(ConstantContactUtility.AuthenticationData,ConstantContactBO.Contact)
member.summary: Update a Contact using the full form. All Contact fields will be updated
member.param: Authentication data (username, password and API Key)
member.exception: Thrown if specified Contact is null
Thrown if Id or Email Address of specified Contact is null or empty

Thrown if communication error with Constant server occur or other related with the response from server, if no Contact with specified Id exists or if Contact cannot be updated (it belongs to the Do-Not-Mail list) or if ApiKey, Username or Password are null or empty

member.name: M:ConstantContactUtility.Utility.UpdateContactSmallForm(ConstantContactUtility.AuthenticationData,ConstantContactBO.Contact)
member.summary: Update a Contact using the simplified form. Only the following fields will be updated: EmailAddress, FirstName, LastName, MiddleName, HomePhone, Addr1, Addr2, Addr3, City, StateCode, StateName, CountryCode, CountryName, PostalCode, SubPostalCode
member.param: Authentication data (username, password and API Key)
member.exception: Thrown if specified Contact is null
Thrown if Id or Email Address of specified Contact is null or empty

Thrown if communication error with Constant server occur or other related with the response from server, if no Contact with specified Id exists or if Contact cannot be updated (it belongs to the Do-Not-Mail list) or if ApiKey, Username or Password are null or empty

member.name: M:ConstantContactUtility.Utility.UpdateContact(ConstantContactUtility.AuthenticationData,ConstantContactBO.Contact,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Update a Contact
member.param: Authentication data (username, password and API Key)

True if all Contact fields will be update; False otherwise (only the following fields will be updated: EmailAddress, FirstName, LastName, MiddleName, HomePhone, Addr1, Addr2, Addr3, City, StateCode, StateName, CountryCode, CountryName, PostalCode, SubPostalCode)
member.exception: Thrown if specified Contact is null
Thrown if Id or Email Address of specified Contact is null or empty

Thrown if communication error with Constant server occur or other related with the response from server, if no Contact with specified Id exists or if Contact cannot be updated (it belongs to the Do-Not-Mail list) or if ApiKey, Username or Password are null or empty

member.name: M:ConstantContactUtility.Utility.PutInformation(ConstantContactUtility.AuthenticationData,System.Uri,System.String)
member.summary: PUT the data at the specified Uri address. Constant Contact server will not send any response
member.param: Authentication data (username, password and API Key)
Data to be send at specified Uri address

member.name: M:ConstantContactUtility.Utility.UnsubscribeContact(ConstantContactUtility.AuthenticationData,System.String)
member.summary: Opting-out ("Unsubscribe") a Contact
member.param: Authentication data (username, password and API Key)
member.exception: Thrown if Id of specified Contact is null or empty
Thrown if communication error with Constant server occur or other related with the response from server or if no Contact with specified Id exists or if ApiKey, Username or Password are null or empty
member.remarks: Opted-out Contacts become members of the Do-Not-Mail special list

member.name: M:ConstantContactUtility.Utility.DeleteInformation(ConstantContactUtility.AuthenticationData,System.Uri)
member.summary: Sends a Http DELETE request at the specified Uri address
member.param: Authentication data (username, password and API Key)

member.summary: Remove Contact from all Contact Lists

member.name: M:ConstantContactUtility.Utility.GetUserContactListCollection(ConstantContactUtility.AuthenticationData,System.String@)
member.summary: Retrieves the first chunk collection of user Contact Lists that the server provides for current Contact Account Owner. The collection is sorted by the Sort Order and it will not include the system predefined lists ("Active", "Removed", "DoNotEmail")
member.remarks: Constant Contact server provides paged collections
member.param: Authentication data (username, password and API Key)
Link to the next chunk data
member.exception: Thrown if communication error with Constant server occur or other related with the response from server or if ApiKey, Username or Password are null or empty
member.returns: The collection of user Contact Lists

member.param: Authentication data (username, password and API Key)
Link to the current chunk data
Link to the next chunk of data
member.exception: Thrown if communication error with Constant server occur or other related with the response from server or if ApiKey, Username or Password are null or empty
member.returns: The collection of user Contact Lists

member.name: M:ConstantContactUtility.Components.ContactComponent.UpdateContact(ConstantContactBO.Contact,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get the Atom entry for the Contact to be updated
member.param: Uri address of Account Owner Contact List resource

True if all Contact fields will be update; False otherwise (only the following fields will be updated: EmailAddress, FirstName, LastName, MiddleName, HomePhone, Addr1, Addr2, Addr3, City, StateCode, StateName, CountryCode, CountryName, PostalCode, SubPostalCode)
member.returns: Atom entry for updating specified Contact
